entities.name: lily
entities.description: Lily is mentioned as a person who is being addressed by Snape. She is described as looking affronted when Snape calls her a witch.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as a person who has an air of nervous excitement and is whispering to Lily. He is described as being highly colored when he says that Lily is a witch.

entities.name: petunia
entities.description: Petunia is mentioned as a person who is hovering beside the swings and is Lily's sister. She is not directly addressed by Snape, but is mentioned in relation to Lily.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who is observing Snape's behavior and wondering why he doesn't take off his large coat.

relationships.description: Snape accuses Lily of being a witch. This is described in the text as Snape whispering to Lily and saying 'You're... you're a witch'.
Snape mentions Petunia in relation to Lily, describing her as hovering beside the swings. This is not a direct relationship between Snape and Petunia, but rather a mention of Petunia's presence.
